name: The pros and cons of TV

data.trans_hint: Nhiều trẻ em thường dán mắt vào TV cả ngày khi ở nhà một mình.
data.en_hint: A lot of children tend to be glued to TV when they are home alone all day.
data.content_game_1: A lot of children tend to be glued to TV when they are home alone all day.
data.answer_en_hint: A lot of children tend to be glued to TV when they are home alone all day.

data.trans: Mở mang thêm vốn hiểu biết
data.trans_hint: TV có thể là nguồn tri thức tuyệt vời giúp mọi người mở mang thêm tri thức về các khía cạnh cuộc sống khác nhau.
data.en_hint: TV can be a great source of knowledge to help people broaden their horizons about different aspects of life.
data.content_game_1: TV can be a great source of knowledge to help people broaden their horizons about different aspects of life.
data.answer_en_hint: TV can be a great source of knowledge to help people broaden their horizons about different aspects of life.

data.trans_hint: Các chương trình vui nhộn trên TV thu hút lũ trẻ xem TV hàng giờ đồng hồ.
data.en_hint: Fun programs on TV draw children in to watch TV for hours.
data.content_game_1: Fun programs on TV draw children in to watch TV for hours.
data.answer_en_hint: Fun programs on TV draw children in to watch TV for hours.

data.trans_hint: Quá đắm chìm vào các chương trình TV có thể cản trở việc tập trung học hành của trẻ.
data.en_hint: Being too immersed into TV programs can get in the way of children's concentration on studies.
data.content_game_1: Being too immersed into TV programs can get in the way of children's concentration on studies.
data.answer_en_hint: Being too immersed into TV programs can get in the way of children's concentration on studies.

data.trans_hint: Bạn nên cai phim dần và tiếp tục cuộc sống của mình đi.
data.en_hint: You should abstain from watching movies and get on with your life.
data.content_game_1: You should abstain from watching movies and get on with your life.
data.answer_en_hint: You should abstain from watching movies and get on with your life.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi đã quen với việc xem phim khuya.
data.en_hint: My mom is used to watching movies late at night.
data.content_game_1: My mom is used to watching movies late at night.
data.answer_en_hint: My mom is used to watching movies late at night.

data.trans: Rất thích/chẳng có lý do gì mà không thích
data.trans_hint: Trẻ con rất thích xem "Tom và Jerry", xê-ri phim hoạt hình nổi tiếng khắp thế giới.
data.en_hint: Children have nothing against "Tom and Jerry" which is a famous cartoon series all over the world.
data.content_game_1: Children have nothing against "Tom and Jerry" which is a famous cartoon series all over the world.
data.answer_en_hint: Children have nothing against "Tom and Jerry" which is a famous cartoon series all over the world.

data.trans_hint: Đừng có vô công rồi nghề xem TV cả ngày như vậy nếu không bạn sẽ bị béo phì đấy.
data.en_hint: Don't just lie about watching TV all day, or else you'll suffer from obesity.
data.content_game_1: Don't just lie about watching TV all day, or else you'll suffer from obesity.
data.answer_en_hint: Don't just lie about watching TV all day, or else you'll suffer from obesity.

data.trans_hint: Xem bóng đá triền miên hàng đêm đã khiến cậu ta suy nhược cơ thể.
data.en_hint: Spending time watching football games on TV night after night has made him run down.
data.content_game_1: Spending time watching football games on TV night after night has made him run down.
data.answer_en_hint: Spending time watching football games on TV night after night has made him run down.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy luôn nhắc cậu con trai tắt TV trước khi ngủ.
data.en_hint: She always reminds her son to switch TV off before sleeping.
data.content_game_1: She always reminds her son to switch TV off before sleeping.
data.answer_en_hint: She always reminds her son to switch TV off before sleeping.

data.trans: Quyết định làm gì sau khi suy nghĩ kỹ
data.trans_hint: Bố mẹ cậu ta đã suy nghĩ kỹ và quyết định mang TV ra khỏi phòng cậu ta.
data.en_hint: His parents took the plunge and brought the TV out of his room.
data.content_game_1: His parents took the plunge and brought the TV out of his room.
data.answer_en_hint: His parents took the plunge and brought the TV out of his room.
